statements.statement: SELECT cd.detail_cd code, decode(${lang},'kr',cd.detail_cd_nm_kr, 'en',cd.detail_cd_nm_en, cd.detail_cd_nm_lo) name, attr1, wt_cd tax_code, wt_rate rate, wt_base_amt base_amt, wt_tax_amt tax_amt FROM lgiusf.tb_comm_cd_master cm, lgiusf.tb_comm_cd_detail cd, ( SELECT wt_type ,pt.wt_cd ,pt.wt_rate ,pt.wt_base_amt ,pt.wt_tax_amt FROM tb_po_tax pt WHERE pt.company_cd = ${companyCd} AND pt.po_no = ${poNo} AND pt.tax_seq = (SELECT MAX(ptt.tax_seq) FROM tb_po_tax ptt WHERE ptt.company_cd = pt.company_cd AND ptt.po_no = pt.po_no) ) ptx WHERE cm.company_cd = cd.company_cd AND cm.group_cd = cd.group_cd AND cm.useyn = 'Y' AND cd.company_cd = ${companyCd} AND cd.group_cd = ${groupCd} AND cd.useyn = 'Y' AND cd.detail_cd = ptx.wt_type(+) ORDER BY SORT

SELECT '0' chk, pd.company_cd, pd.po_no, pd.po_seq, pd.mater_cd, (SELECT DECODE(${lang},'kr',mi.mater_nm_kr, 'en',mi.mater_nm_en,mater_nm_lo) FROM tb_mater_info mi WHERE mi.company_cd = pd.company_cd AND mi.mater_cd = pd.mater_cd) mater_nm, pd.qty, pd.unit, pd.vat_cd, lgiusf.F_GETCOMMNAME('COMM',pd.company_cd ,${lang},'2007',pd.vat_cd) vat_nm, pd.price, pd.sap_price, pd.amount, pm.currency_cd, case when pd.receipt_cls_yn = 'Y' then pd.receipt_qty else pd.qty end as previous_qty, -- 기존 입고 수량 pd.qty - pd.receipt_qty as receipt_qty, -- 입고할 수량 pd.vat_amt, --to_number(pd.sap_price)*to_number(pd.receipt_qty) as vat_amt, pd.receipt_cls_yn, pd.tran_tax_rate, pd.tran_tax_amt, pm.iv_close FROM lgiusf.tb_po_detail pd, lgiusf.tb_po_master pm WHERE pm.company_cd = pd.company_cd AND pm.po_no = pd.po_no AND pd.company_cd = ${companyCd} AND pd.po_no = ${poNo} --AND pd.receipt_cls_yn = 'Y' -- close가 Y인 아이템만 조회 AND pm.iv_close != 'Y' -- invoice가 close 안된 아이템만 조회 ORDER BY pd.po_seq ASC

SELECT 'F' as chk ,im.company_cd ,im.po_no ,im.iv_seq ,im.sap_po_no ,im.vend_cd ,im.iv_date ,im.post_date ,im.due_date ,im.iv_amt ,im.currency_cd ,im.vat_amt ,im.vat_cd ,im.plant ,im.stor_loct ,im.sap_iv_do_no ,im.sap_gr_do_no ,im.sap_cancel_iv_do_no ,im.sap_cancel_gr_do_no ,im.status ,im.send_stat ,im.send_date ,im.send_msg ,im.cancel_stat ,im.cancel_date ,im.cancel_msg ,pm.attr2 po_type ,pm.regdate FROM tb_iv_master im ,tb_po_master pm WHERE im.company_cd = pm.company_cd AND im.po_no = pm.po_no AND im.company_cd = ${companyCd} {#1} {#2} {#3} {#4} {#5} ORDER BY PO_NO, TO_NUMBER(IV_SEQ)
AND im.po_no like '%'||${poNo}||'%'
AND pm.regdate >= REPLACE(${fromPoDate},'/','')
AND pm.regdate <= REPLACE(${toPoDate},'/','')
AND im.post_date >= REPLACE(${fromPostDate},'/','')
AND im.post_date <= REPLACE(${toPostDate},'/','')

SELECT 'F' as chk ,D.COMPANY_CD ,D.PO_NO ,D.IV_SEQ ,ITEM_SEQ ,D.MATER_CD ,AMT ,PD.QTY ,IV_QTY ,D.VAT_CD ,DECODE(${lang},'kr',MI.mater_nm_kr,'en',MI.mater_nm_en, MI.mater_nm_en) mater_nm ,MI.UNIT ,D.TRAN_TAX_RATE ,D.TRAN_TAX_AMT FROM TB_IV_MASTER M, TB_IV_ITEM D, TB_MATER_INFO MI, TB_PO_DETAIL PD WHERE M.company_cd = D.company_cd AND M.po_no = D.po_no AND M.iv_seq = D.iv_seq AND D.company_cd = PD.company_cd AND D.po_no = PD.po_no AND D.item_seq = PD.po_seq AND M.company_cd = ${companyCd} AND D.iv_seq = ${seq} AND D.PO_NO = ${poNo} AND D.company_cd = MI.company_cd AND D.mater_cd = MI.mater_cd ORDER BY ITEM_SEQ

SELECT LPAD(TO_NUMBER(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(WT_SEQ,0,4)),0)+1), 4, '0') || '0' as WT_SEQ FROM TB_IV_WT WHERE PO_NO = ${poNo} AND IV_SEQ = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(IV_SEQ)) FROM TB_IV_MASTER WHERE PO_NO = ${poNo})
